test.name: Verify Query - Folder flag

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: Getting file 'C:\Users\Aliaksei_Veshtart\OneDrive - EPAM\Work\Learn\Data Quality Engineering Mentoring Program (Intermediate Level) 6\05 - Test Automation for Data Quality Engineers - part 1\_tests_\sql\Production\Document\FileExtension_FolderFlag.sql'.

${sql_query} = SELECT sum(Extention_result) AS Ext_res ,sum(FolderFlag_result) AS Fold_res FROM ( SELECT FolderFlag ,FileName ,FileExtension ,Extension ,CASE WHEN FileExtension LIKE Extension THEN 0...

kw.name: Query
kw.doc: Uses the input `selectStatement` to query for the values that will be returned as a list of tuples. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback. Set optional input `returnAsDict` to True to return values as a list of dictionaries.
kw.msg: Executing : Query | SELECT sum(Extention_result) AS Ext_res ,sum(FolderFlag_result) AS Fold_res FROM ( SELECT FolderFlag ,FileName ,FileExtension ,Extension ,CASE WHEN FileExtension LIKE Extension THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS Extention_result ,CASE WHEN FolderFlag = FolderTestFlag THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS FolderFlag_result FROM ( SELECT FolderFlag ,FileName ,FileExtension ,CASE WHEN FileName LIKE '%.%' THEN reverse(left(reverse(FileName), charindex('.', reverse(FileName)))) ELSE '' END AS Extension ,CASE WHEN FileExtension = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS FolderTestFlag FROM Production.Document ) t ) t1;
${output} = [{'Ext_res': 0, 'Fold_res': 0}]

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: [{'Ext_res': 0, 'Fold_res': 0}]

test.name: Verify Query - Check full duplicates in UnitMeasure

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: Getting file 'C:\Users\Aliaksei_Veshtart\OneDrive - EPAM\Work\Learn\Data Quality Engineering Mentoring Program (Intermediate Level) 6\05 - Test Automation for Data Quality Engineers - part 1\_tests_\sql\Production\UnitMeasure\duplicates.sql'.
${sql_query} = SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT UnitMeasureCode ,Name ,count(*) AS count FROM Production.UnitMeasure GROUP BY UnitMeasureCode ,Name HAVING count(*) > 1 ) t;

kw.name: Query
kw.doc: Uses the input `selectStatement` to query for the values that will be returned as a list of tuples. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback. Set optional input `returnAsDict` to True to return values as a list of dictionaries.
kw.msg: Executing : Query | SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT UnitMeasureCode ,Name ,count(*) AS count FROM Production.UnitMeasure GROUP BY UnitMeasureCode ,Name HAVING count(*) > 1 ) t;

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
